duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable data pipelines, ensuring the seamless integration of various data sources into Snowflake.
Collaborate with data scientists and analysts to understand data requirements and translate them into efficient ETL processes.
Optimize data pipelines for performance, reliability, and data quality, utilizing best practices in data engineering.
Develop and maintain data models, schema designs, and data dictionaries within Snowflake.
Work closely with the DevOps team to ensure proper deployment, monitoring, and logging of data pipelines.
Troubleshoot and resolve data pipeline issues, ensuring minimal downtime and data integrity.
Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies in data engineering and share insights with the team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
Certifications in Snowflake and relevant cloud platforms are advantageous.
